meanings.sent1: I saw many cute pooches at the park.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor has two pooches that love to play fetch.
meanings.sent3: The pooches in the dog show were all wagging their tails happily.
meanings.sent4: The little girl's eyes lit up when she saw the fluffy pooches.
meanings.sent5: The shelter was full of pooches waiting for their forever homes.

meanings.definition: To move or act in a clumsy or inept way.
meanings.sent1: He pooches around the kitchen, knocking over pots and pans.
meanings.sent2: The comedian pooches through his routine, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: She pooches her way through the dance, tripping over her own feet.
meanings.sent4: The toddler pooches along the hallway, bumping into walls.
meanings.sent5: The robot pooches awkwardly on the dance floor, trying to mimic human movements.
